amendatorysection.catchline: State assistance to political subdivisions and nonprofit corporations; terms, defined.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Commission means the Commission on Indian Affairs;
(2) Indian reservation means a tract of land set apart by the federal government for the use of the Native American people; and
(3) Political subdivision means a city, village, or county within a sixty-mile radius of an Indian reservation or a tribal government that owns land within such sixty-mile radius.
